channel.title: Rathika Sitsabaiesan
channel.description: Recent news about Rathika Sitsabaiesan, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Scarborough MPs deeply divided over latest electoral boundary changes
... NDP MP Sitsabaiesan says 'priority neighbourhoods' must be kept together. Photographs by Jake Wright, The Hill Times. Riding boundaries: Liberal MP Jim Karygiannis and NDP MP Rathika Sitsabaiesan, pictured at last week's House Affairs Committee.

item.title: Mentioned by Brantford Expositor
item.description:
Conference for leaders of tomorrow held in Brantford
Brant NDP federal candidate of record Marc Laferriere and Rathika Sitsabaiesan, the MP for Scarborough-Rouge River, speak with Ryan Jamula of Brantford, president of the provincial NDP riding association. Sitsabaiesan, the youngest MP in Ontario, was ...

item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca
item.description:
Warawa and Rathgeber take off their muzzles
Worth Noting: Power Play's Commons Folk segment featured NDP MP Rathika Sitsabaiesan, the first Tamil MP in Canada, who says that she helps to highlight human rights abuses being suffered in Sri Lanka. Liberal leadership candidate Martha Hall Findlay ...

item.title: Introduced legislation
item.description:
Private member's bill C-471
An Act to designate the month of January as Tamil Heritage Month

item.title: Introduced legislation
item.description:
Private member's bill C-265
An Act to establish criteria and conditions in respect of funding for post-secondary education programs in order to ensure the quality, accessibility, public administration and accountability of those programs
